channel.title: Error when logging in
channel.description:
I am using RSCEasy, and I am able to compile it succesfully, but whenever I log in I get this error in the control panel. [Other] Account Created: gfrk [Error] java.lang.NumberFormatException: null And in the control panel, batch I get this. [code]Unable to locate tools.jar. Expected to find it in C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\li b\tools.jar Buildfile: C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Desktop\EasyRSC\Server\build.xml
runserver: [java] java.lang.NumberFormatException: null [java] at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) [java] at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.model.Player.load(Player.java:962) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.packethandler.client.PlayerLogin.handleP acket(PlayerLogin.java:64) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GameEngine.processIncomingPackets(GameEn gine.java:160) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:110) [/code]
Any help or directions to what went wrong is appreciated.

item.title: Error when logging in
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

More information would be more helpful. This can happen if you have something that’s trying to be sent when logging in that doesn’t exist in the CFG/Template file.

Read full topic

item.title: Error when logging in
item.dc:creator: @Shob Shob
item.description:
@Shob wrote:

Start by looking around line 962 in the Player.java? lol you’ve probably changed some on the server side that needs to be changed on the client side aswell.

Read full topic

item.title: Error when logging in

item.description:

I am using RSCEasy, and I am able to compile it succesfully, but whenever I log in I get this error in the control panel.

[Error] java.lang.NumberFormatException: null
